alert.note: Alert for Davie; Eastern Polk; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 08 at 1:09AM EST until February 08 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of upstate South Carolina and the northwest Piedmont of North Carolina. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and some slippery spots on bridges and overpasses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are hovering around freezing across the northwest Piedmont of North Carolina, but there are some locations where the temperature was below freezing. Where the temperature falls below freezing, the fog droplets may freeze on elevated surfaces, resulting in an additional danger for slippery patches on bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
